title: http: HandleFunc should ignore port
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Add "127.0.01        tdomain.com" to /etc/hosts
2. go run issue.go
3. Browse tdomain.com:1111


What is the expected output?
Browser displays "Hit root"


What do you see instead?
Result is "404 page not found"

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
weekly.2012-02-22 +96bd78e7d35e

Which operating system are you using?
Linux 64bit

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
96bd78e7d35e weekly/weekly.2012-02-22

Please provide any additional information below.
The source file contains commented out samples which might give hints for further issues
to consider
